articles.title: Martinez edging closer to Villa career crossroads
articles.summary: Emiliano Martinez is hailed as the world's best goalkeeper at Aston Villa home games - but even though his team are riding high, the Argentina international is at a crossroads.

articles.title: Man Utd have taken step towards winning formula - Rooney
articles.summary: Manchester United have taken a "step" towards getting the club back to where it was in their glory days, says former captain and record goalscorer Wayne Rooney.

articles.title: Highlights: Defending champion Keys defeated at Australian Open
articles.summary: Highlights from the Australian Open as defending champion Madison Keys lost her fourth-round match against Jessica Pegula.

articles.title: Scheffler claims 20th PGA Tour title to match feats of Woods and Nicklaus
articles.summary: World No 1 Scottie Scheffler secured his 20th PGA Tour title with a four-shot victory at The American Express on his first start of the 2026 season.

articles.title: Why Arsenal's wobble may not even matter - despite 'feeling pressure'
articles.summary: Arsenal's winless run may normally be cause for concern - but the stats suggest they are still in control of the Premier League title race.

articles.title: 'Another unbelievable result' - but what's different about Man Utd now?
articles.summary: MOTD pundit Danny Murphy explains how Manchester United earned their impressive win at Premier League leaders Arsenal, and how he feels the Gunners will react.

articles.title: 'Intoxicating title fight impossible to call as Hearts refuse to buckle'
articles.summary: Depleted Scottish Premiership leaders Hearts passed the latest test of their mettle in compelling draw with Celtic, writes Tom English.

articles.title: 'They're engaged' - Rosenior continues positive start at Chelsea
articles.summary: Liam Rosenior has started well at Chelsea and it bodes well for the future amid ambitions to qualify for the Champions League.

articles.title: Why can't Newcastle win without Guimaraes?
articles.summary: Newcastle United have yet to win a league game without Bruno Guimaraes since he made his debut for the club in 2022.

articles.title: Hearts 'rattle' Celtic - but did red card play 'massive part'?
articles.summary: Hearts and Celtic play out a thrilling draw in the Scottish Premiership title race. But did Hearts deserve to win? Or did a controversial red card cost Celtic?

articles.title: How many points will it take to win Scottish Premiership?
articles.summary: BBC Scotland crunches the numbers behind a gripping three-way fight for the Scottish top-flight title.

articles.title: Forest boost survival hopes after win at Brentford
articles.summary: Nottingham Forest gave their hopes of Premier League survival a major boost with a hard-fought win against Brentford at Gtech Community Stadium.

articles.title: Totally unrealistic to win every game - Arteta
articles.summary: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says his side were "not at their best today" but it is "totally unrealistic" to win every single game after his side lost 3-2 to Manchester United at the Emirates Stadium.

articles.title: 'Hunter' Rangers have 'big opportunity' in title race - Rohl
articles.summary: Danny Rohl is relishing Rangers' role as the "hunter" in the Scottish Premiership title race after delivering a "statement" victory to reduce Hearts' advantage at the top.

articles.title: 'There's no magician' - can Palace stop the slide?
articles.summary: After a torrid few weeks with captain Marc Guehi sold, manager Oliver Glasner confirming he will leave and striker Jean-Philippe Mateta wanting a transfer, are Crystal Palace's struggles on the field ...

articles.title: Leicester sack Cifuentes after six months as boss
articles.summary: Marti Cifuentes is sacked as Leicester City manager after just six months in charge with the Foxes in the bottom half of the Championship.

articles.title: Why mentality matters for Wrexham and their latest promotion bid
articles.summary: With a 'never count out Wrexham' mantra, the club's latest comeback victory puts Phil Parkinson's side firmly in the Championship promotion picture.

articles.title: Patriots beat Broncos in near blizzard to book Super Bowl spot
articles.summary: The New England Patriots booked their place at Super Bowl LX as they edged out the Denver Broncos 10-7 in near blizzard conditions in the AFC Championship game.
